name: IBM Carbon Design System â€” White, G10, G90, G100 (all themes)
description:
This file is based on version 11 of IBM's Carbon design system

https://v11.carbondesignsystem.com/


This file uses Figma Tokens to swap between themes

https://www.figma.com/community/plugin/843461159747178978/Figma-Tokens


Instructions for Figma Tokens plugin:

  • Keep Global theme checked
  • Uncheck the checkbox for themes you don't want to use
  • Check the checkbox for the theme you want to use


Swapping between themes changes what palette colors the color styles are mapped to. It's reversible and non-destructive, meaning that one file can be used to manage all themes!


This file is still a work-in-progress, so please treat it as a first-draft and feel free to leave comments and suggestions!


I'm working on adding more documentation to the file, so let me know about anything you find confusing or unclear :)
